app.title: Vitify Admin
app.description: Vuetify 3 + Nuxt 3, Opinionated Admin Starter Template

auth.loginRequired: You must be logged in to access this page.

notifications.attachSuccess: Group linked to the user successfully.

errors.passwordRequired: A password is required to create a new user.
errors.openView: Unable to open this user's details.
errors.loadDetails: Unable to retrieve the user's details.
errors.loadGroups: Unable to retrieve the user's groups.
errors.selectGroup: Select a group to link this user.
errors.attachFailed: Unable to link this group to the user.
errors.detachFailed: Unable to unlink this group from the user.

errors.createFailed: Unable to create the user group.
errors.updateFailed: Unable to update the user group.
errors.loadDetails: Unable to load the user group details.
errors.loadUsers: Unable to retrieve the group's users.
errors.selectUser: Select a user to link to this group.
errors.attachFailed: Unable to link this user to the group.
errors.detachFailed: Unable to unlink this user from the group.
errors.deleteFailed: Unable to delete this user group.

errors.createFailed: Unable to create the API key.
errors.updateFailed: Unable to update the API key.
errors.loadDetails: Unable to load the API key details.
errors.deleteFailed: Unable to delete the API key.
errors.partialUpdateRequired: Provide at least one field to update the API key.
